p: All residuals were randomly dispersed along the horizontal axis indicating good overall model performance [ 58]. This demonstrates, with field records spanning ~40 years of present-day climate, that most stands are young to immature (0–40 years) due to intensive harvests in the past [ 37, 59]. However, dispersion of data points along the x-axis (BA) increased in Fig 5 b–5 d , since these Figs show results of 90 years growth predicted by JABOWA-3 under climate change scenarios.
